articles.title: Lori Loughlin's husband Mossimo Giannulli reports to prison for five-month sentence for college admissions scandal - CNN
articles.description: Mossimo Giannulli reported to prison Thursday to begin his five-month sentence at the Federal Correctional Complex Lompoc.
